CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 24, 1945, pg. 1, reads: "Illusion Baffled Iowa St. Drivers - Optical Illusion Fools Drivers - In the past month, three serious accidents have occurred at the junction of Iowa Street and Ewart Drive.  Drivers contend that they are fooled by and optical illusion at the end of Iowa Street and where Ewart Drive begins.  Allequippa Street looms before them as they approach the end of Iowa, but there is a deep ravine and Centre Avenue between Iowa and Allequippa.  ...At the right, arrow points to where cars have been coming down the hillside and over the steps which lead to Centre Avenue. - Courier Photos by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Woman standing on sidewalk of Centre Avenue with municipal steps to Iowa Street and Ewart Drive in background, Hill District
